result.execSummary:
All charges against Shawn Renal Wright in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Shawn Renal Wright is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn Renal Wright

Defendant Shawn Renal Wright in court.  Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court for Shawn Renal Wright.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Shawn Renal Wright in court.  Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court for Shawn Renal Wright.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Final pre-trial held. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for a jury trial on 9/28/22 at 9:00 am in Branch 41.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
State's Motions in Limine, received and filed.
State's Witness List, received and filed.
Received and Filed. Defendant's Motion in Limine
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Shawn Renal Wright in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Case is in trial posture, defense counsel requests case be placed on the trial calendar. Any pretrial motions to be filed a week before the final pretrial date. Case adjourned to Branch 35. Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court, defendant Shawn Renal Wright not in court, in custody.  Mark Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense requests status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.    Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant Shawn Renal Wright in court with attorney Julita Kishma de Leon.  Defendant Shawn Renal Wright in custody.  Sara Beth Hill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shawn Renal Wright appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Hearing held via zoom/DAcast.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
